import { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { UserContext } from '../../App' import RecipeForm from '../recipes/RecipeForm' function Recipe({name, steps, ingredients, cookbooks}) { const route = useParams() const [editMode, setEditMode] = useState(false) return ( <> { route.id ?
